properties.name: help
properties.description: Show description of help with tooltip effect

properties.name: autoInit
properties.description: When autoInit equals true, component will emit value on mount of it

properties.name: textThrough
properties.description: When textThrough equals true, the active text will with a line through and inactive checkbox container will have white background and etc

properties.name: disabled
properties.description: When set as true checkbox will be disabled

properties.name: name
properties.description: With this property Checkbox will be listening to validation with current value for e.g. 'validateTest'

properties.name: touchName
properties.description: With this property, Checkbox component will listen to event with prefix 'touch' + and this property capitalized
